content.description: The following code segment is used to determine whether a customer is eligible for a discount on a movie ticket.
content.question: val1 <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> (NOT (category = "new")) OR (age ≥ 65)val2 <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> (category = "new") AND (age < 12)If category is "new" and age is 20, what are the values of val1 and val2 as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
